name: a friendly ghost
description:
Talk to a ghost about what's going on inside your head. Don't listen to the thing that keeps telling you that it's a bad idea -- this is a friendly ghost, I promise!

  • Two endings - one bad, one good.
  • Short, 5k words in total.
  • Read trigger warnings before you play (please!)

(I've never done this before and I was really just playing around with twine so if there are any mistakes or bugs let me know! I made this to cope with some of my really annoying thoughts, that's all.)
